title: The Favorites - NFL Best Bets 2022
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Best Bets 2022
description:
The NFL offseason is hurtling to a swift conclusion, so Action Network betting experts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter return with a roundup of their top picks heading into Week 1. The guys are high on the Jaguars and Eagles, but hesitant to buy the hype on the Buffalo Bills. Plus, we hear their takes on each division, their darkhorse MVP candidates and so much more. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
